item.title: Drawing tickets from a canvas
item.description: Ongoing Project References: [1] Frankle, Jonathan, and Michael Carbin. “The lottery ticket hypothesis: Finding sparse, trainable neural networks.” arXiv preprint arXiv:1803.03635 (2018). [2] Paul, Mansheej, Surya Ganguli, and Gintare Karolina Dziugaite. “Deep Learning on a Data Diet: Finding Important Examples Early in Training.” Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems 34 (2021). [3] Caccia, Lucas, Jing Xu, Myle Ott, Marc’Aurelio Ranzato, and Ludovic Denoyer. “On Anytime Learning at Macroscale.” arXiv preprint arXiv:2106.
